root.name: Scooby-Doo: Jinx at the Sphinx
root.description: PlotThe plot follows Scooby-Doo and the Gang as they travel to Egypt to visit Velma's cousin, but as they get there they find out that she's disappeared, and a mummy is scaring off the tourists. Now, the Gang has no other choice but to find out who's behind this.System RequirementsWindows 95/98/Me/2000/XP Pentium 166 or faster CPU (300MHz for XP)45 MB hard drive space 32 MB RAM (128 for XP) 16-bit color display, set to 640 x 480 resolution 8X or faster CD-ROM 16-bit sound card compatibility
